title: Enhancing Programming Practical Competencies: Language Learning Effectiveness Program Utilizing XR Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Foreign Language Proficiency at Intermediate Level or Above and Experience with Digital Devices
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners improve language communication skills in real-life-like scenarios by 30% or more through three or more simulation practices in XR environments
Learners can reproduce context-specific dialogues in the target language with over 90% accuracy using interactive features of XR content
Learners confirm knowledge retention rates of 80% or higher in post-XR learning tool surveys and demonstrate significant improvement in language proficiency through pre-/post-assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
